issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Image Worker Fails to Convert Instance Store-Backed Paravirtual EMI - AttributeError: 'Namespace' object has no attribute 'image_size'

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: *Assessment* After setting up a Eucalyptus 4.0.0 (eucalyptus-4.0.0-0.0.1012.20140509git8e016639.el6.x86_64) cloud from the latest testing branch, the image worker (eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image-1.0.0-0.165.140507git9127d5a.el6.x86_64) instance failed to convert the instance store-backed paravirtual EMI, which caused the paravirtual instance to stay in a 'pending' state. The following error was seen in the worker log: {code} 2014-05-09 15:48:05,982 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 request data: AWSAccessKeyId: AKI3WLLHYDPKQORTWCQU 2014-05-09 15:48:05,982 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 request data: Policy: eyJleHBpcmF0aW9uIjoiMjAxNC0wNS0xMVQxNTo0NjoxNC40NzBaIiwiY29uZGl0aW9ucyI6W3siYnVja2V0IjogImV1Y2EtaW50ZXJuYWwteHZza2QtdHJ1 c3R5LXNlcnZlci1wYXJhdmlydC12MiJ9LFsic3RhcnRzLXdpdGgiLCAiJGtleSIsICJ0cnVzdHktc2VydmVyLWNsb3VkaW1nLWFtZDY0LmltZyJdLHsiYWNsIjoiYXdzLWV4ZWMtcmVhZCJ9XX0= 2014-05-09 15:48:05,982 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 request data: Signature: C2QFSZ7MkAZlHeRzvF1YZL7eMjw= 2014-05-09 15:48:05,982 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 request data: acl: aws-exec-read 2014-05-09 15:48:05,982 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 request data: key: trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.part.00 2014-05-09 15:48:05,982 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 request file: file: 2014-05-09 15:48:06,256 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 response time: 0.267 seconds 2014-05-09 15:48:06,256 euca-workflow [ERROR]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 response status: 404 2014-05-09 15:48:06,256 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 response header: content-length: 307 2014-05-09 15:48:06,257 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 response header: content-type: application/xml 2014-05-09 15:48:06,257 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 response header: date: Fri, 09 May 2014 15:48:06 GMT 2014-05-09 15:48:06,257 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) S3 response header: x-amz-request-id: 49b7b669-20a0-4d80-a19e-48fbb9ad30b2 2014-05-09 15:48:06,284 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) PostObject -- response content -- 2014-05-09 15:48:06,285 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) NoSuchBucketThe specified bucket does not exist.euca-internal-xvskd-trusty-server-paravirt-v2aab41549-44ae-45f9-9d15-6b1f47e3286d 2014-05-09 15:48:06,285 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) PostObject -- end of response content -- 2014-05-09 15:48:06,285 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) PostObject result: failure 2014-05-09 15:48:06,286 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) euca-bundle-and-upload-image: error (NoSuchBucket): The specified bucket does not exist. 2014-05-09 15:48:06,287 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) Traceback (most recent call last): 2014-05-09 15:48:06,287 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) File "/usr/bin/euca-bundle-and-upload-image", line 6, in 2014-05-09 15:48:06,287 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) euca2ools.commands.bundle.bundleanduploadimage.BundleAndUploadImage.run() 2014-05-09 15:48:06,287 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 298, in run 2014-05-09 15:48:06,288 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) cmd.handle_cli_exception(err) 2014-05-09 15:48:06,288 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 295, in run 2014-05-09 15:48:06,288 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) result = cmd.main() .... 2014-05-09 15:48:06,296 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) return self.handle_server_error(err) 2014-05-09 15:48:06,296 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/s3/__init__.py", line 175, in handle_server_error 2014-05-09 15:48:06,296 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) self, err) 2014-05-09 15:48:06,296 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 167, in send 2014-05-09 15:48:06,296 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) auth=self.auth) 2014-05-09 15:48:06,296 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 193, in send_request 2014-05-09 15:48:06,296 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) self.handle_http_error(response) 2014-05-09 15:48:06,297 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/s3/__init__.py", line 58, in handle_http_error 2014-05-09 15:48:06,297 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) raise AWSError(response) 2014-05-09 15:48:06,297 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (404, 'Not Found', 'NoSuchBucket', 'The specified bucket does not exist.') 2014-05-09 15:48:07,815 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) Process Process-3: .... 2014-05-09 15:48:08,366 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) 000001446 diskutil_loop | attaching file /mnt/imaging/euca-workflow-cache-eDfXZk/__baloon_blob__/blocks 2014-05-09 15:48:08,366 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) 000001446 diskutil_loop | to /dev/loop0 at offset 0 2014-05-09 15:48:08,370 euca-workflow [DEBUG]:(import-is-0d4bc754) 000001446 diskutil_unloop | detaching from loop device /dev/loop0 2014-05-09 15:48:08,379 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) 000001446 blobstore_delete | removing blobstore metadata '/mnt/imaging/euca-workflow-cache-eDfXZk/.blobstore' 2014-05-09 15:48:08,379 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) 000001446 main | imager done (exit code=0) 2014-05-09 15:48:08,384 euca-workflow [INFO]:(import-is-0d4bc754) workflow failed (error in subprocess) 2014-05-09 15:48:08,406 worker [ERROR]:(import-is-0d4bc754) euca-run-workflow returned code: 5 2014-05-09 15:48:25,085 worker [ERROR]:(import-is-0d4bc754) Processing of the task import-is-0d4bc754 failed 2014-05-09 15:48:55,120 worker [INFO]:Querying for new imaging task 2014-05-09 15:49:25,438 worker [INFO]:Querying for new imaging task 2014-05-09 15:49:55,764 worker [INFO]:Querying for new imaging task {code} In an effort to see if the instance failed for another reason, the paravirt instance was terminated. When another paravirt instance was launched, the following error is returned: {code} [root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-run-instances -k euca-admin -t m1.large emi-8ad3c8aa euca-run-instances: error (InvalidAMIID.NotFound): Failed to lookup image named: emi-8ad3c8aa {code} When checking the image using euca-describe-images, the following is seen: {code} [root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-images IMAGE eki-98aa5a3f trusty-server-kernel/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-vmlinuz-generic.manifest.xml 214091788602 available private x86_64 kernel instance-store IMAGE emi-0d882d1f loadbalancer-v1/eucalyptus-load-balancer-image.img.manifest.xml 214091788602 available private x86_64 machine instance-store hvm IMAGE emi-2a4c16d5 imaging-worker-v1/eucalyptus-imaging-worker-image.img.manifest.xml 214091788602 available private x86_64 machine instance-store hvm IMAGE emi-8ad3c8aa trusty-server-paravirt/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64.img.manifest.xml 214091788602 failed private x86_64 machine eki-98aa5a3f eri-f5866067 instance-store paravirtual IMAGE eri-f5866067 trusty-server-ramdisk/trusty-server-cloudimg-amd64-loader.manifest.xml 214091788602 available private x86_64 ramdisk instance-store {code} *Pertinent Data* * The only difference I did on this cloud from previous clouds was the fact that I changed the VM type of the Image Worker before launching ANY instance: {code} $ euca-modify-property -p imaging.imaging_worker_instance_type=m1.large [root@odc-f-13 ~]# euca-describe-instance-types m1.large INSTANCETYPE Name CPUs Memory (MiB) Disk (GiB) INSTANCETYPE m1.large 1 1024 10 {code}
fields.summary: Image Worker Fails To Convert Instance Store-Backed Paravirtual EMI

comments.body: The issue manifests when SC is not co-located with clc or in HA topology. Try multiple number of PV image registration.

Using Packages from 5/19 I was able to run/convert PV images in the following multicluster topo in both kvm and vmware...

CENTOS	6.3	64	REPO	[CLC WS OSG UI]
CENTOS	6.3	64	REPO	[CC00 SC00]
CENTOS	6.3	64	REPO	[NC00]
CENTOS	6.3	64	REPO	[CC01 SC01]
VMWARE	ESXI-5.1	64	REPO	[NC01]
